Legal_Issue: Was the applicant denied procedural fairness or natural justice during the refugee status determination process?
Evidence_Assessment: Credibility issues arose in the Refugee Division's assessment
Decision_Outcome: The court found no breach of procedural fairness or natural justice
Credibility_Factor: Applicant's credibility was questioned regarding threats from the GIA
Legal_Rule: Applicants have the right to counsel but not an absolute one; adjournments are granted reasonably
Procedural_Issue: Right to counsel and request for adjournment
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: No breach of procedural fairness or natural justice found
Key_Evidence_Considered: Applicant's claim of threats from GIA
Applicant_Challenge: Claimed denial of procedural fairness due to lack of counsel
Remedy_Requested: Judicial review of Refugee Division's decision
Outcome: Refugee status denied; judicial review dismissed
Legal_Provision: Immigration Act provisions on refugee status and procedural fairness
Applicable_Process: Refugee status determination and judicial review
Governing_Rule: Right to counsel and procedural fairness under the Immigration Act
